query_performance.description: Recent land records with owner info
query_performance.query:
SELECT l.*, u.full_name as owner_name 
                       FROM land_records l 
                 ...

SELECT t.*, l.plot_number 
                       FROM transactions t 
                       JOIN l...

SELECT * FROM blockchain 
                       ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM land_records 
                       WHERE division = ? AND district =...

SELECT d.*, l.plot_number 
                       FROM documents d 
                       JOIN land...

SELECT u.role, COUNT(*) as count 
                       FROM users u 
                       GROUP ...

SELECT t.status, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(t.sale_price) as avg_price 
                       FROM tran...
